```r
cor(log(housing_data$median_house_value), housing_data$total_rooms)
cor(log(housing_data$median_house_value), sqrt(housing_data$total_rooms))# Second highest correlation
cor(log(housing_data$median_house_value), exp(housing_data$total_rooms))
cor(log(housing_data$median_house_value), log(housing_data$total_rooms)) # Highest correlation
cor(log(housing_data$median_house_value), housing_data$total_rooms^2)
```
